value:
$WmMPID_ヴィオール,ch04_05_Viaur_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You know, Cherche, you are not my
vassal anymore. You need not
accompany me—yet here you are...$k$pAh! Could you have fallen helplessly
in love with your gallant Virion?$k$p$WmMPID_セルジュ,ch04_18_Serge_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Careful not to take that joke too far...
You may wind up between Minerva's
jaws. Who would I train with then?$k$p$Sbs1000|
